name: Selfie Therapy (Prototype)
description:
Take the best selfie ever, in a world populated by plant people, in order to move from your student apartment to get a place in a dream influencer villa!

Selfie Therapy is contemporary rewriting of Pokémon Snap, made as a school project. The hero do not use a camera anymore, but his smartphone, and post his selfies on social medias. The player would be able to interact with this fictionnal ultra connected society, through the app Narcisse, and the protagonist's everyday life, Jack. He will make many weird and funny encounters.

Pierre : programming
Corry : 3D modeling
My-Loan : 2D graphisms (character design, poses, 2D objects)
Rémi : 2D graphisms (character design, interface, filters, stickers)

Everybody took part during the game and level design's conception.
